Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.math

Class Polar2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.math.Polar2D
  • public class Polar2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that is used to store polar coordinates. It's heavily dependant on the vector and angle class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Polar2D​(double mag, Angle ang)
      Create a Polar2D with a magnitude and an angle
      Polar2D​(Vector2D vec)
      Convert a Vector2D into Polar Coordinates
